FuncDef:
The local-backup offline-reason quota-out command enables information backup for users that are logged out due to duration or traffic volume quota exhaustion.
The undo local-backup offline-reason quota-out command disables information backup of users that are logged out due to duration or traffic volume quota exhaustion.
By default, information backup of users that are logged out due to duration or traffic volume quota exhaustion is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To allow IPoE users who are logged out due to duration or traffic volume quota exhaustion to go online by sending IP or ARP packets, run the local-backup offline-reason quota-out command. Then, local backup entries will be generated when users go offline.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
